Text.Name: RockBase
Text.Item.FabaoSuffix: Stone, Seal, Stele, Dualjade, Tablet, Tower, Boulder

Text.Name: Item_BrownRock
Text.Desc: Stone of a brown color; a very common material.

Text.Name: Item_GrayRock
Text.Desc: Stone of a grey color; a very common material.

Text.Name: Item_Marble
Text.Desc: Marble is a common stone material. Its texture is rather attractive.

Text.Name: Item_Jade
Text.Desc: Fine and hard stone that is glossy and slightly translucent, it is very attractive and full of spiritual qualities.

Text.Name: Item_JadeEssence
Text.Desc: The essence of a jade stone, it is light in weight, has a smooth surface and very beautiful. Often used for making high-end decorations, and also for medicine.

Text.Name: Item_StoneEssence
Text.Desc: The essence of a stone, it is light in weight, has a smooth surface and very beautiful. Often used for making high-end decorations, and also for medicine.

Text.Name: Item_SkyStone
Text.Desc: A rare kind of rock said to be dug up from the celestial pillars, with boisterous Qi of the Earth element dwelling within it.

Text.Name: Item_ExtremeJade
Text.Desc: A much sought-after treasure among cultivators, it naturally presents the form of a cylindrical crystal. Possesses exceptional Qi adaptability.

Text.Name: Item_LingStone
Text.Desc: Solid formed by condensation of highly concentrated Qi. Consuming it restores 500 Qi, and improves your Qi Affinity for a certain period of time.

Text.Name: Item_LingCrystal
Text.Desc: Crystal formed by condensation of highly concentrated Qi. Consuming it restores 20000 Qi, and significantly improves your Qi Affinity for a certain period of time.
